title: Bug 114905: Default value in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: The default value that was previously set in the list box of the report parameter is lost.
EB: After modifying the default value, the report parameter should retain the originally set default value.
SR:
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the report.
2. Locate the list box of the report parameter.
3. Modify the default value of the list box.
4. Save the changes.
5. Close and reopen the report.
6. Verify if the default value in the list box is retained.
